recipe.title: Southwestern Chicken And Rice Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: ½ teaspoon ; fresh cilantro, finely chopped
½ cup ; white rice, cooked ; (65 g)
½ cup ; shredded rotisserie chicken ; (60 g)
⅛ cup ; shredded cheese blend ; (10 g)
½ teaspoon ; fresh cilantro, finely chopped

steps.step: Make the sauce: Combine the sour cream, lime juice, cumin, paprika, salt, pepper, and cilantro in a mason jar. Stir with a fork until smooth and well-combined.
Add the rice, black beans, corn, tomato, chicken, cheese, and cilantro.
Store in the refrigerator for 2-3 days.
When ready to eat, shake well to combine.

steps_updated.steps_updated: Make the sauce: Combine the sour cream, lime juice, cumin, paprika, salt, pepper, and cilantro in a mason jar.
Stir with a fork until smooth and well-combined.
Add the rice, black beans, corn, tomato, chicken, cheese, and cilantro.
Store in the refrigerator for 2-3 days.
When ready to eat, shake well to combine.
